§ 40104. Cooperation among Mission Directorates Research and development activities performed by the Aeronautics Research Mission Directorate with the primary objective of assisting in the development of a flight project in another Mission Directorate shall be funded by the Mission Directorate seeking assistance. (Pub. L. 111–314, § 3, Dec. 18, 2010, 124 Stat. 3379.)
